question: Name two notable lakes surrounding Trakai, Lithuania.
true_answer: Galvė Lake and Lukos Lake (also known as Bernardinų Lake).
asked_question_translated: Nosauciet divus ievērojamus ezerus, kas atrodas ap Trakai, Lietuvā.
answer: Divi ievērojami ezeri, kas atrodas ap Trakai, Lietuvā, ir Galves ezers un Skaisčio ezers.
answer_translated_eng: Two prominent lakes around Trakai, Lithuania, are Lake Galves and Lake Skaisčio.
